hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Abdullah bin Hilal Ath-Thaqafi said:"A man came to the Prophet and said: 'I feared that I might be killed after you are gone for the sake of a goat or sheep of the Sadaqah.' He said: 'Were it not that it will be given to the poor Muhajirin I would not have taken it."' (Daif)

chapter.ara-name: باب إِعْطَاءِ السَّيِّدِ الْمَالَ بِغَيْرِ اخْتِيَارِ الْمُصَدِّقِ
chapter.eng-name: Owner Giving Something Without The Zakah Collector Choosing It
